name: Drunk Drive
description:
One car, a lot of beers and one endless highway.

Show your skills driving, Drunk Drive will test your skill and reflexes.
We give you the option of do what is illegal in the streets of your city, driving drunk at full speed, dodging all type of vehicles, from taxis and trucks to trailers and the pope´s mythical car.

-One tap game
-18 vehicles to choose
-Endless random highway
-Beat your highscore to unlock more cars
